lead_paragraph: GUTFREUND--John H. A Memorial Service for John H Gutfreund will be held at 583 Park Avenue (63rd Street) on Monday, March 14, 2016 at 5:30pm. In lieu of flowers, please consider a donation to one of the charities where he was a long-time board member: The Montefiore Health System, The New York Public Library, or Aperture Foundation. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GUTFREUND, JOHN H
